name: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City
title: A Journey with No Return: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City
desc: "The gates of hell are stained red by the flowing blood of the brave. Let me offer my blood, and leave the key to those gates with my child."
in_play_description:
After the character to which this is attached consumes Nightsoul points: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. Repeats once. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
